value.raw:
Mother's House

Deliverance Center - Mother's Day 2016


READING: Genesis 24: 10-28

  • 23 And said, Whose daughter art thou? tell me, I pray thee: is there room in thy father's house for us to lodge in?

  • 24 And she said unto him, I am the daughter of Bethuel the son of Milcah, which she bare unto Nahor.

  • 28 And the damsel ran, and told them of her mother's house these things.


SCRIPTURES:

Pr 9:1 Wisdom hath builded her house, she hath hewn out her seven pillars:

Pr 14:1 Every wise woman buildeth her house: but the foolish plucketh it down with her hands.

Song 3:4 It was but a little that I passed from them, but I found him whom my soul loveth: I held him, and would not let him go, until I had brought him into my mother's house, and into the chamber of her that conceived me.

Lu 10:38 Now it came to pass, as they went, that he entered into a certain village: and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house.

Ac 16:15 And when she was baptized, and her household, she besought us, saying, If ye have judged me to be faithful to the Lord, come into my house, and abide there. And she constrained us.


What are mothers?

Well, mothers are teachers. Mothers are disciplinarians. Mothers are cleaning ladies. Some mothers are gardeners & mowers of lawns. Mothers are nurses & doctors & psychologists & counselors & chauffeurs & coaches.

Mothers are developers of personalities, molders of vocabularies, & shapers of attitudes. Mothers are soft voices saying, "I love you." And mothers are a link to God, a child's first impression of God's love. Mothers are all these things & much, much more.


Motherhood is an ideal!


  1. Set the Tone of the Home


Pr 31:30 Favour is deceitful, and beauty is vain: but a woman that feareth the LORD, she shall be praised.


  1. Daily Education and Instruction

Both Practical and Spiritual


  1. Manager & Upkeep

What did your mother do? What do you do? [DISCUSSION]
